title: Blended Learning Course Based on Gagné’s Nine-Stage Instructional Design for Dental Materials Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended course design for pre-service and in-service teachers to deliver advanced dental materials science knowledge and strengthen pedagogical competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can design online modules for dental materials science by applying Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction
Learners explain properties and clinical applications of major dental materials (e.g., composite resins) with 90% accuracy
Learners analyze the effectiveness of designed educational modules using at least three evaluation criteria through peer assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
